BASIC.NS_NO_RESPONSE: Nameserver {source} did not respond to NS query.
BASIC.NO_GLUE: Nameservers for "{parent}" provided no NS records for tested zone. RCODE given was {rcode}.
BASIC.NS_FAILED: Nameserver {source} did not return NS records. RCODE was {rcode}.
BASIC.HAS_NAMESERVERS: Nameserver {source} listed these servers as glue: {ns}
BASIC.NO_DOMAIN: Nameserver for zone {parent} responded with NXDOMAIN to query for glue.
BASIC.HAS_GLUE: Nameserver for zone {parent} listed these nameservers as glue: {ns}
BASIC.NO_PARENT_RESPONSE: No response from nameserver for zone {parent} when trying to fetch glue.

CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVER_HAS_UDP_53: Nameserver {ns}/{address} accessible over UDP on port 53.
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVER_NO_UDP_53: Nameserver {ns}/{address} not accessible over UDP on port 53.
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVER_HAS_TCP_53: Nameserver {ns}/{address} accessible over TCP on port 53.
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVER_NO_TCP_53: Nameserver {ns}/{address} not accessible over TCP on port 53.
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVER_IPV6_ADDRESS_BOGON: Nameserver {ns} IPv6 address {address} is part of a bogon prefix.
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVER_IPV6_ADDRESSES_NOT_BOGON: None of the {nb} nameserver(s) with IPv6 addresses is part of a bogon prefix.
CONNECTIVITY.NAMESERVERS_WITH_UNIQ_AS: All nameservers are in the same AS ({asn}).

ZONE.REFRESH_MINIMUM_VALUE_LOWER: SOA 'refresh' value ({refresh}) is less than the recommended one ({required_refresh}).
ZONE.REFRESH_LOWER_THAN_RETRY: SOA 'refresh' value ({refresh}) is lower than the SOA 'retry' value ({retry}).
ZONE.RETRY_MINIMUM_VALUE_LOWER: SOA 'retry' value ({retry}) is less than the recommended one ({required_retry}).
ZONE.EXPIRE_MINIMUM_VALUE_LOWER: SOA 'expire' value ({expire}) is less than the recommended one ({required_expire}).
ZONE.EXPIRE_LOWER_THAN_REFRESH: SOA 'expire' value ({expire}) is lower than the SOA 'refresh' value ({refresh}).
ZONE.SOA_DEFAULT_TTL_MAXIMUM_VALUE_HIGHER: SOA 'minimum' value ({minimum}) is higher than the recommended one ({highest_minimum}).
ZONE.SOA_DEFAULT_TTL_MAXIMUM_VALUE_LOWER: SOA 'minimum' value ({minimum}) is less than the recommended one ({lowest_minimum}).
ZONE.MASTER_IS_AN_ALIAS: SOA 'mname' value ({mname}) refers to a NS which is an alias (CNAME).
ZONE.MX_RECORD_IS_CNAME: MX record for the domain is pointing to a CNAME.
ZONE.NO_MX_RECORD: No target (MX, A or AAA record) to deliver e-mail for the domain name.

HOSTNAME.NON_NUMERIC_TOP: {name} does not have an all-numeric top-level label.
HOSTNAME.DASH_END: {name} has a label that ends with a dash character.
HOSTNAME.NO_DASH_END: {name} has no labels ending with dash characters.
HOSTNAME.NON_ALPHANUMERIC_START: {name} does not start with an alphanumeric character.

DELEGATION.REFERRAL_SIZE_LARGE: The smallest possible legal referral packet is larger than 512 octets (it is {size}).
DELEGATION.REFERRAL_SIZE_OK: The smallest possible legal referral packet is smaller than 513 octets (it is {size}).
DELEGATION.EXTRA_NAME_PARENT: Parent has nameserver(s) not listed at the child ({extra}).
DELEGATION.EXTRA_NAME_CHILD: Child has nameserver(s) not listed at parent ({extra}).
DELEGATION.EXTRA_ADDR_PARENT: Parent has nameserver(s) address that do not exist at the child side ({extra}).
DELEGATION.EXTRA_ADDR_CHILD: Child has nameserver address(es) that do not exist at the parent side ({extra}).
DELEGATION.TOTAL_NAME_MISMATCH: None of the nameservers listed at the parent are listed at the child.
DELEGATION.NAMES_MATCH: All of the nameserver names are listed both at parent and child.
DELEGATION.ADDRESSES_MATCH: All of the nameserver addresses are listed both at parent and child.
DELEGATION.TOTAL_ADDRESS_MISMATCH: None of the nameserver addresses listed at the parent are listed at the child.
DELEGATION.NOT_ENOUGH_NS_GLUE: Parent does not list enough nameservers ({count}).
DELEGATION.NOT_ENOUGH_NS: Child does not list enough nameservers ({count}).
DELEGATION.INZONE_NO_GLUE: In-zone nameserver {ns} does not have any glue.

CONSISTENCY.ONE_SOA_SERIAL: A single SOA serial number was seen ({serial}).

DNSSEC.ALGORITHM_DEPRECATED: The DNSKEY with tag {keytag} uses deprecated algorithm number {algorithm}.
DNSSEC.ALGORITHM_OK: The DNSKEY with tag {keytag} uses algorithm number {algorithm}, which is OK.
DNSSEC.ALGORITHM_RESERVED: The DNSKEY with tag {keytag} uses reserved algorithm number {algorithm}.
DNSSEC.ALGORITHM_UNASSIGNED: The DNSKEY with tag {keytag} uses unassigned algorithm number {algorithm}.
DNSSEC.DNSKEY_AND_DS: {parent} sent a DS record, and {child} a DNSKEY record.
DNSSEC.DNSKEY_BUT_NOT_DS: {child} sent a DNSKEY record, but {parent} did not send a DS record.
DNSSEC.DNSKEY_NOT_SIGNED: The apex DNSKEY RRset was not correctly signed.
DNSSEC.DNSKEY_SIGNATURE_NOT_OK: Signature for DNSKEY with tag {signature} failed to verify with error '{error}'.
DNSSEC.DNSKEY_SIGNATURE_OK: A signature for DNSKEY with tag {signature} was correctly signed.
DNSSEC.DNSKEY_SIGNED: The apex DNSKEY RRset was correcly signed.
DNSSEC.DS_BUT_NOT_DNSKEY: {parent} sent a DS record, but {child} did not send a DNSKEY record.
DNSSEC.DS_DIGTYPE_NOT_OK: DS record with keytag {keytag} uses forbidden digest type {digtype}.
DNSSEC.DS_DIGTYPE_OK: DS record with keytag {keytag} uses digest type {digtype}, which is OK.
DNSSEC.DS_DOES_NOT_MATCH_DNSKEY: DS record with keytag {ds} does not match DNSKEY with keytag {dnskey} and algorithm {algorithm}.
DNSSEC.DS_MATCHES_DNSKEY: DS record with keytag {ds} does match DNSKEY with keytag {dnskey} and algorithm {algorithm}.
DNSSEC.DURATION_LONG: RRSIG with keytag {tag} and covering type(s) {types} has a duration of {duration} seconds, which is too long.
DNSSEC.DURATION_OK: RRSIG with keytag {tag} and covering type(s) {types} has a duration of {duration} seconds, which is just fine.
DNSSEC.DURATION_SHORT: RRSIG with keytag {tag} and covering type(s) {types} has a duration of {duration} seconds, which is too short.
DNSSEC.EXTRA_PROCESSING_BROKEN: Server at {server} sent {keys} DNSKEY records and {sigs} RRSIG records.
DNSSEC.EXTRA_PROCESSING_OK: Server at {server} sent {keys} DNSKEY records and {sigs} RRSIG records.
DNSSEC.INVALID_NAME_FOUND: When asked for the name {name}, which must not exist, the response was not an error.
DNSSEC.INVALID_NAME_RCODE: When asked for the name {name}, which must not exist, the response had RCODE {rcode}.
DNSSEC.ITERATIONS_OK: The number of NSEC3 iterations is {count}, which is OK.
DNSSEC.MANY_ITERATIONS: The number of NSEC3 iterations is {count}, which is on the high side.
DNSSEC.MATCH_FOUND: At least one DS record at the parent matched a DNSKEY at the child.
DNSSEC.MATCH_NOT_FOUND: The parent side has one or more DS records, but there are no matching DNSKEY records on the child side.
DNSSEC.NEITHER_DNSKEY_NOR_DS: There are neither DS nor DNSKEY records for the zone.
DNSSEC.NO_DNSKEY_FOR_DS: The DS records with keytag {keytag} has no corresponding DNSKEY record.
DNSSEC.NO_KEYS_OR_NO_SIGS: Cannot test DNSKEY signatures, because we got {keys} DNSKEY records and {sigs} RRSIG records.
DNSSEC.NO_KEYS_OR_NO_SIGS_OR_NO_SOA: Cannot test SOA signatures, because we got {keys} DNSKEY records, {sigs} RRSIG records and {soas} SOA records.
DNSSEC.NSE3C_SIG_VERIFY_ERROR: Trying to verify NSEC3 RRset with RRSIG {sig} gave error '{error}'.
DNSSEC.NSEC3_NOT_SIGNED: No signature correctly signed the NSEC3 RRset.
DNSSEC.NSEC3_SIGNED: At least one signature correctly signed the NSEC3 RRset.
DNSSEC.NSEC_NOT_SIGNED: No signature correctly signed the NSEC RRset.
DNSSEC.NSEC_SIGNED: At least one signature correctly signed the NSEC RRset.
DNSSEC.NSEC_SIG_VERIFY_ERROR: Trying to verify NSEC RRset with RRSIG {sig} gave error '{error}'.
DNSSEC.SOA_NOT_SIGNED: No RRSIG correctly signed the SOA RRset.
DNSSEC.SOA_SIGNATURE_NOT_OK: Trying to verify SOA RRset with signature {signature} gave error '{error}'.
DNSSEC.SOA_SIGNED: At least one RRSIG correctly signs the SOA RRset.
DNSSEC.TOO_MANY_ITERATIONS: The number of NSEC3 iterations is {count}, which is too high for key length {keylength}.
